author: Simon Hill
title: Apple HomeKit Secure Video: Pros and Cons
description: Shopping for a security camera or video doorbell? Before you go all-in on Apple’s framework, there are some things to consider.
content: If you're shopping for indoor or outdoor security cameras, video doorbells, or a mix of all three to cover your property, finding a system you can trust is tougher than it should be. Between security… [+2788 chars]
